name: Yukari
description: Requires max Charm in order to start this social link. First available on July 25th afterwards on Monday, Wednesday, Thursday and Saturday. She's located in your classroom.
ranks: Rank 2: Say "Pink's cute" > That's messed up
Rank 5: Say anything x3 > Try to cheer her up
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Cybele through Normal or Triangle fusion.
